subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] A voice in the noise?
author: Lisby
full_text:
Well, maybe Mr. Edison wants pepperoni on his? ;)

Ann

On Feb 26, 2008, at 3:48 PM, Frank Sumption wrote:

>  At about 7-8 seconds "to our famous ghosts" or am I hearing  
> things, and just before that "give some pizza".  The shield is the  
> copper flavored structure. The pots are for sweep rate, and tone  
> control. It's just a couple voices like that to renew my faith and  
> enjoyment.
>
>  I'm adding the linear sweep today, along with the monitor amp, and  
> mic amp. the point of this being to test for the elimination of  
> noise in the older tuner module boxes with a shield over the white  
> noise circuit. I don't have any of the older boxes, so have to make  
> a board to test it. I could have shielded the tuner instead but  
> usually pick the hardest way first, beside, the home made tuners  
> are more sperad out.
>
>  Frank-S
>
>
> Need to know the score, the latest news, or you need your Hotmail®- 
> get your "fix". Check it out.
>
>  <022608-TunerWithWhiteNoise.3g2>
